bibl.note: See in part. pp. 124-130: Antigonus and Demetrius: basileis in 307? Ptolemy I: basileus in 308?

bibl.title: After Alexander. The Time of the Diadochi (323-281 BC).

bibl.seg: Paschalis Paschidis, Agora XVI 107 and the Royal Title of Demetrius Poliorcetes.
Víctor Alonso Troncoso & Edward M. Anson (edd.), After Alexander. The Time of the Diadochi (323-281 BC) (Oxford - Oakville, CT, 2013) pp. 121-141, 1 fig.
See in part. pp. 124-130: Antigonus and Demetrius: basileis in 307? Ptolemy I: basileus in 308?
